title: Magic Boost Official
author: Magic Boost Official
created_time: May 04, 2023, 08:04:11 AMLast edit: May 04, 2023, 08:27:21 AM by Magic Boost Official
content: https://i.ibb.co/0cf2Vx7/Fv-ITSU5-Xo-AEpecs.pngBOUNTY DETAILS:Magic Boost, the innovative Web3 Affiliate Network by Magic Square, is hosting a month-long airdrop campaign to introduce the “1Click Promotion” feature. Seize this chance to be among the 10 fortunate winners who will receive $500 each week, amounting to a total of $20,000!Raffle Details:Enhance your chances of winning by obtaining raffle entries with each successful referral on the Magic Boost platform. Each week, 10 raffle winners will be awarded $500 each! The more referrals you make, the better your chances of winning.Contest Timeline and Winner Reveal:The weekly raffle begins every Monday at 00:01 CET and concludes the following Monday at 00:00 CET. Stay tuned for winner announcements every Monday on Magic Boost’s official Twitter account, and be prepared to check your inbox, as winners will be contacted via their registered email addresses.How to Enter the Airdrop:To participate in the Airdrop, you must complete 4 tasks. You will find more details about each task below:1. Complete all Gleam Tasks2. Open a Magic Store account, create a MagicID, and fully verify it3. Open a Magic Boost account4. Make at least 1 successful referral on the Magic Boost PlatformComplete all Gleam Tasks:To participate in the Magic Boost Airdrop campaign, start by completing all the gleam tasks. Follow the steps below to complete the tasks:1. Visit the Gleam campaign page2. Follow the instructions and complete each task as requiredOpening a Magic Store account and verifying your Magic ID:Your Magic ID is a versatile and unique tool designed to manage and control personal data within a single crypto-application. It grants access to the Magic Store, a hub for web3 and blockchain projects. Follow these straightforward steps to create a Magic Store account with your MagicID:1. Visit https://magic.store/2. Connect a wallet or sign up using your email/Gmail account (this will create your Magic Store account)3. Then, you will need to verify your email, choose a username and connect a wallet4. After completing the 3 steps above, you will now have a Magic Store account with a verified MagicIDhttps://i.ibb.co/dWw7x2v/1.pngOpen a Magic Boost Account:Magic Boost, a Web3 and Blockchain Affiliate Network, provides over 50 live offers to earn from through referrals.Sign up through the Magic Store:1. Go to the Magic Store, and log in to the account you opened in the previous step2. Click the third icon on the menu bar (the Magic Boost Rocket)3. Proceed with a wallet sign-in, or click “Continue with Email”https://i.ibb.co/ws4H5N2/2.pngOr, sign up through a landing page:1. Click this link2. Under “Join as an affiliate” fill in your full name, email address, and desired passwordhttps://i.ibb.co/JrBttp3/3.pngMake at least 1 successful referral on Magic Boost:Improve your chances of winning by making more referrals! Each referral made earns you one raffle entry. To learn about the requirements for each campaign on Magic Boost, select an offer, click “Offer Details,” and review the provided information. Choose offers that best suit you — some are easier than others!There are 2 Types of Offers on Magic Boost. “Join Offers” & “Purchase Offers”:Join Offers: These are offers where users simply need to join a project’s community, download their app, connect a wallet, etc. In these offers, there is NO PURCHASE NEEDED. They are usually marked with an “EASY” tab on the platform:https://i.ibb.co/Qr13JnS/4.pngPurchase Offers: These are offers where users need to exchange a certain amount of funds to be eligible to earn a commission. Examples include staking a specific number of tokens, trading with at least $100, or buying a Ledger Stax Wallet:https://i.ibb.co/HTts297/5.pngPromoting Offers Like a Pro:Promote offers on Magic Boost to maximize your earnings! Simply click on “Actions” for the offer you want to promote, and then click on “Offer Details.” You can either click on “Copy Link Url” and craft your own promotional creatives or click on “1Click Promotion” to use our expertly-designed templates.Ready, set, promote!Our 1Click Promotion allows you to:1. Share your links on multiple social media platforms with just one click2. Save time & effort with pre-designed templates tailored to match your preferences3. Perfect for both newbies and experienced marketersHow to use 1Click-Promotion:1. Log in to your account2. Choose an offer you’d like to promote3. Click on the 1Click Promotion button4. Select a platform and template — Share it!https://i.ibb.co/4gtbWDX/6.pnghttps://i.ibb.co/JtCkHPL/Screenshot-at-May-04-09-55-18.pngAfter completing all the Gleam tasks, opening a Magic Store account, fully verifying your MagicID, and making at least one successful referral, you will be entered into the raffle for a chance to win $500 every week. Increase your chances of winning the $500 weekly prize by making more referrals!If you need help or have any questions, contact our support team via our FreshDesk Ticket System, DM us on Twitter, or Join the Magic Square Discord Server where the community managers be happy to assist!
